Pre-Game Insights: The Clippers are preparing to build on their performance with Kawhi Leonard's return, aiming to take the next steps toward becoming a great team.
Post-Match Reflections: Kawhi Leonard's return and performance were noted, with the team aiming to continue their progress and contention in the playoffs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Clippers have a deep, hungry, and well-coached squad, with defensive capabilities ranked fourth in the NBA.
